features: 3-STAGE FILTRATION: The 3-Stage Filtration System removes up to 99.97% of airborne pollutants and allergens, capturing particles as small as 0.3 microns; air filter is designed to include a pre-filter layer, True HEPA filter, and a carbon filter
360-DEGREE AIR INTAKE: 360-degree air intake system efficiently captures air from all around the room to purifiy and release crisp clean air
PERFECT FOR BEDROOMS: 100 CADR (Clean Air Delivery Rate) allows pure airflow, with coverage ideal for most bedrooms and other medium-sized rooms up to 155 square feet
QUIET OPERATION: At the low setting, operates at 30 decibels/dBA (as quiet as a library) so you can enjoy a restful night of sleep, while still benefitting from clean air
3 SPEED SETTINGS: 3 speed settings to customize your comfort
body.description: Breathe cleaner, fresher air with Bionaire. The Bionaire Medium Room True HEPA Air Purifier purifies the air using a 360-degree air intake system to efficiently capture air from all around a room. The 360-degree filter works to clean your air in 3 stages. The first stage captures large particles like hair and dust in the pre-filter. In the second stage, small particles as small as 0.3 microns pass through the True HEPA filter, which removes up to 99.97% of airborne allergens from the air including smoke, mold spores, pet dander, pollen, dust mites, and bacteria. Finally, in the third stage, the carbon layer eliminates common household odors such as cooking fumes and pet odors. This True HEPA air purifier can clean the air in spaces of about 155 square feet, making it ideal for most bedrooms. Features a low/quiet setting that allows it to continue cleaning the air throughout the night without disturbing your sleep.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3-Stage Filtration System Purifies Air Stage 1 Large particles, like hair and dust, are captured in the pre-filter. Stage 2 Particles as small as 0.3 microns pass through the True HEPA filter, which removes up to 99.97% of airborne allergens from the air—ideal for homes with allergy sufferers and pets. Stage 3 The carbon layer eliminates common household odors such as cooking fumes and pet odors. Key Features 360-degree air intake system 3-stage filtration True HEPA filter removes up to 99.97% of airborne pollutants 3 speed settings, including Low/Quiet Medium-room air purifier ideal for most bedrooms

Enjoy Fresh, Clean Air in Your Home 360-Degree Air Intake System Efficiently capturing air from all around a room, the 360-degree air intake system then purifies and cleans, releasing crisp and comfortable air. Easy to Use and Maintain Simple touch controls make it easy to use, and the True HEPA filter lasts up to 18 months before it needs to be replaced. Medium-Room Air Purifier This air purifier and filter’s 100 CADR (Clean Air Delivery Rate) allows pure airflow and covers room sizes up to 155 square feet.

Perfect for Bedrooms Features 3 speed settings so you can customize it for your comfort and operates quietly on 30 decibels/dBA when on Low—that’s as quiet as a library—so you can enjoy a restful night surrounded by clean air. The soft nightlight also makes it perfect for an adult or child’s bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Link for replacement filters
reviews.reviewText: I've had this air purifier for almost 2 years now and I really like it. I got it during covid when I was sick with a cold and was living in an apartment that probably had mold. At any rate, I was indoors a lot and needed cleaner air. This purifier works great!One thing I've noticed is that a lot of reviewers are saying they can't find any replacement filters. But I've been buying replacement filters on Amazon and they seem to work great. I do think maybe they don't last quite as long, but it could just be that I live in a very dusty house. 🤷🏼‍♀️ So here is the link for all y'all.Bionaire Genuine 3 in 1 True HEPA Air Filter for BAP9921 Air Purifier,White https://a.co/d/gvMllPuI hope this helps y'all out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very efficient at reducing dust and odors even
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for our bedroom to help with my allergies. Noticed a change in the air quality after the first day and night. The three fan levels are great. Run it on highest at night so it doubles as white noise for sleeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No replacement filters available!!
reviews.reviewText: This device is amazing! I bought it for my pup who has allergies and it worked wonders for her! Unfortunately, there doesn’t seem to be any place to buy replacement filters which is so disappointing because this is one of the best air purifiers I’ve bought! The price point, the quality of the job and the noise level were perfect. I’m just disappointed that Amazon would offer this product without any way of purchasing replacement filters (the company stated that it has been discontinued) especially since I bought it through the treasure truck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing works so well, we bought another one for the other end of the house,,
reviews.reviewText: We put one in the living room, and liked it so much, we bought one and put it into our bedroom. Within a matter of days, we noticed we were breathing better. Put one in the bedroom, and we are sleeping better. The reduction in the amount of dust is fantastic. Out sinuses see, to be more clear, and we aren’t waking up feeling clogged.The fan is not exactly quiet, so we have it on medium, and it acts as a white noise machine.The filter doesn’t need to be changed but once a year.I so highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, non intrusive looking. Works well. Good purchase!
